channel.title: ansible on Phelipe Teles
channel.description: Recent content in ansible on Phelipe Teles

item.title: Ansible for dotfiles: the introduction I wish I've had
item.description: A dotfiles repo will help you manage configuration over time and synchronize them across machines, but it won’t help you with your dependencies – you still have to install git, tmux, vim, etc.

item.title: Moving away from tiling window managers
item.description: This is the story about how I’m moving away from a tiling window manager, dwm, to a full-blown desktop environment, GNOME.
